Description: Egypt, view of pyramid of Khufu reflected in lake or river. Single-storey buildings at each side of water. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Geography: Location suggested by J M Hudson, 28/01/1998. Circumstances: The Imperial War Museum holds photographs from the same collection with a more military content - see [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
